name: iSpring Embedder
author: Harsh

sections.description: This plugin is created to Embedd iSpring generated HTML powerpoint presentations to WordPress. Once installed, you will see a page “iSpring Embedder” on admin menu. You can upload the iSpring generated HTML5 PPT zip file to the upload form and the plugin will extract the content and display a shortcode to use it in your post or page . Shortcode will display your iSpring content as an iframe.
sections.installation:
1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘iSpring Embedder’
  3. Install and Activate iSpring Embedder from your Plugins page.
  4. Visit ‘iSpring Embedder’ from admin menu and upload an HTML5 PPT file. (You can also delete them.)
  5. You will see your added PPT on the same page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘iSpring Embedder’
  3. Install and Activate iSpring Embedder from your Plugins page.
  4. Visit ‘iSpring Embedder’ from admin menu and upload an HTML5 PPT file. (You can also delete them.)
  5. You will see your added PPT on the same page.

How to set width and height of the iframe ??

You can set dimensions of the iframe by adding width and height parameters to shortcode.
For Example : [ppt_embedder id=\’1\’ width=\’800px\’ height=\’300px\’]

What about foo bar?

short_description: Embed iSpring converted HTML5 Presentations to WordPress pages
description: This plugin is created to Embedd iSpring generated HTML powerpoint presentations to WordPress. Once installed, you will see a page “iSpring Embedder” on admin menu. You can upload the iSpring generated HTML5 PPT zip file to the upload form and the plugin will extract the content and display a shortcode to use it in your post or page . Shortcode will display your iSpring content as an iframe.
